CustomField.formula: IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Species__c,'Dog'), Combined_Age_In_Weeks__c >= 20),'Dog', IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Species__c,'Dog'), Combined_Age_In_Weeks__c < 20),'Puppy', IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Species__c,'Cat'), Combined_Age_In_Weeks__c >= 20),'Cat', IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Species__c,'Cat'), Combined_Age_In_Weeks__c < 20),'Kitten', IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Species__c,'PeeWee'), Combined_Age_In_Weeks__c >= 20),'PeeWee Cat', IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Species__c,'PeeWee'), Combined_Age_In_Weeks__c < 20),'PeeWee Kitten',''))))))
CustomField.label: Canine/Feline Age
